text: Uncle's Apartment () is a 1913 Russian silent movie directed by Pyotr Chardynin.Созвездие Петра Чардынина: за творческую жизнь он снял более 200 фильмовДядюшкина квартира It stars Dora Citorena, Andrey Gromov, and Aleksandr Kheruvimov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:1913 movies Category:Movies directed by Pyotr Chardynin
title: Uncle's Apartment
